alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 22 at 11:26AM MDT until May 23 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Trail Creek at Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Trail Creek Ketchum 7.0 6.6 Mon 10 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-230130- /O.EXT.KPIH.FL.A.0006.000000T0000Z-230523T2200Z/ /TCKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.OO/ 1126 AM MDT Mon May 22 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Trail Creek at Ketchum. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Near bankfull from near Corral Creek and Trail Creek to the confluence of the Big Wood River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Monday the stage was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
